nodes.title: Write a C/C++/Java program to toggle case of each character of a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to extract a substring from a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to convert uppercase string to lowercase.
Write a C/C++/Java program to concatenate two strings.
Write a C/C++/Java program to remove first occurrence of a word from string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to read a file and remove the spaces between two words of its content.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find the length of a string without using library function.
Write a C/C++/Java program to copy one string to another string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a given substring is present in the given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find maximum occurring character in a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a character is digit or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find total number of alphabets, digits or special character in a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a string and print it.
Write a C/C++/Java program to remove characters in String Except Alphabets.

Write a C/C++/Java program to count the number of occurrences of any two vowels in succession in a line of text. For example, in the sentence “Pleases read this application and give me gratuity” such occurrences are ea, ea, ui
Write a C/C++/Java program to count of each character in a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find length of a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print individual characters of string in reverse order.
Write a C/C++/Java program to remove last occurrence of a word in given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to count total number of vowels and consonants in a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to remove all occurrence of a word in given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to sort a string array in descending order.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find reverse of a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to sort a string array in ascending order.
Write a C/C++/Java program to count total number of words in a string.
Write a C/C++/Java program that will read a line and delete from it all occurrences of the word ‘the’.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find last occurrence of a word in a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to convert vowels into upper case character in a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find first occurrence of a word in a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a string is palindrome or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to convert lowercase string to uppercase.
Write a C/C++/Java program to that takes a set of names of individuals and abbreviates the first, middle and other names except the last name by their first letter.
Write a C/C++/Java program to delete all vowels from a sentence. Assume that the sentence is not more than 80 characters long.
Write a C/C++/Java program to count occurrences of a word in a given string.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a string and print it.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a character is digit or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to separate the individual characters from a string.
